name: Ghost Driver
overview: Published in Magic Disk 64 1993/10. You're the blue car that has to get all the flags, while dodging the suicidal red car, driven by a spectre. Every toddler now knows what a ghostwriter is. Whether difficult exams or long essays, for every topic there is an eager scribe who, for good payment, reaches into the keys. The "ghost riders", however, are a completely different species and prefer to race in their classy sledges over the highways, to make matters worse, as ghost riders. You take on the role of a peaceful fellow citizen who has to pick up the flags without colliding with these unscrupulous piste hooligans. You play with the joystick in port # 2, and you start by pressing the space bar. If you press the joystick button while driving, your car will gain speed. However, this should be handled with moderation, because it can happen that all of a sudden an obstacle appears that has to be avoided. In addition, bonus items appear that refresh the points account. Bomb - player or ghost driver loses a life STOP - the respective vehicle is stopped for a few seconds S - player is credited with 100 bonus points an extra SMILY will give you an extra life to extend the fun.
